metadata.title: Epic Adventure Quest
metadata.description: Embark on an epic journey through mystical lands filled with dangerous enemies and hidden treasures.

messages.notification: Level up! Your skills have improved.

tutorials.step: Use WASD keys to move your character in different directions.
Press spacebar to interact with objects and NPCs in the game world.
Open your inventory with the I key to manage items and equipment.
Check your quest log with the Q key to track your current objectives.
Press ESC at any time to access the game menu and settings.
